item.title: Lysa add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake!" -- Scott Adams

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "I am only responsible for my own heart, you offered yours up for the smashing my darling. Only a fool would give out such a vital organ" -- Anais Nin

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "Goddamn it, do it yourself. You’re five hundred years old and you can’t use a telephone? Read the directions. What are you, an immortal idiot?" -- Anne Rice

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Poppy Z. Brite
item.description: "You hold onto what you have; you do not give it up easily, even when you know it is poisoning you." -- Poppy Z. Brite

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Poppy Z. Brite
item.description: "The night is the hardest time to be alive and 4am knows all my secrets." -- Poppy Z. Brite

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Bill Watterson
Lysa add a quote by BILL WATTERSON
item.description: "It's not denial. I'm just selective about the reality I accept." -- BILL WATTERSON

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "You know, Hobbes, some days even my lucky rocket ship underpants don't help." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I think we dream so we don't have to be apart so long. If we're in each other's dreams, we can play together all night." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Girls are like slugs—they probably serve some purpose, but it's hard to imagine what." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I like my smock. You can tell the quality of the artist by the quality of his smock. Actually, I just like to say smock. Smock smock smock smock smock smock." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Lysa add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett
